text: November 1828 is a 1979 Indonesian historical war movie directed by Teguh Karya and starring Maruli Sitompul, Yenni Rachman, Slamet Rahardjo, El Manik. It won 6 Citra Awards, including Best Picture and Best Director. ==Other websites== * ==References== Category:1979 war movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:Indonesian movies Category:Movies set in the 1820s
title: November 1828
